main.name: Pankeel Shah
main.description: I'm a Computer Science student at the University of Minnesota Twin Cities, looking at opportunities for Summer 2021.
main.bio2: I like building awesome software. I've built websites, apps, corporate software and even games! If you are interested, you can view some of my favorite projects in my portfolio down below. Need something built or simply want to have chat? Reach out to me on social media or send me an email.
main.bio3: When I'm not coding my next project, I enjoy spending my time watching Netflix, working out, hanging out with friends, and meeting new people.
main.contactMessage: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Modernized store procedures for barcodes by developing Springboot and Kotlin microservices
work.description2: Deployed a Praxis UI allowing the generation and interpretation of random weight barcodes
work.description3: Engineered unit and integration tests using Spock and Groovy to verify application functionality

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Worked as part of a Verification Testing Scrum Team, developing automated tests using .NET and Selenium to validate requirements for the CareLink Network
work.description2: Designed and managed human-readable acceptance tests using SpecFlow
work.description3: Raised issues and collaborated with developers to ensure that website requirements are satisfied

classes: User Interface Design, Implementation and Evaluation
